summary: While conducting an investigation into the mysterious death of a fellow officer, a cop's own reputation is questioned when a suspect in his custody is shot.
cast: Vijay Sethupathi|Ramya Nambeeshan|Vela Ramamoorthy|Girrish|Master Raghavan|Fighter Karthi
director: Director: S.U. Arun Kumar (as S.U. Arun Kumar)
title: Sethupathi
